## Logistics

{{< fa bullhorn >}} : you will work with the `R` programming language in this course. 

You need either to install `R`, `RStudio` and `VS Code` on your computer, or to use your `posit-cloud` account. 

{{< fa bullhorn >}} Install `Quarto` on your computer to render the `.qmd` files. 

Please follow the instructions [here](/computing-access.qmd) to install `R`, `RStudio`, `VS Code`, and `Quarto` or to access `posit-cloud`. 

{{< fa bullhorn >}} Please activate your ENT account (follow the instructions on [Moodle](https://moodle.u-paris.fr/course/view.php?id=2313)). You will be able to access the PostGres server.
